channel.title: [718 Matrix] Help please with 2 commands!
channel.description:
Hey guys, i need 2 commands. I want it to when you put the command in, it puts the gears i type below to automaticly equip, and the inventory spawns. Thanks.
One of them is Nh. I will explain that here:
Ok, so basicly i want ::nh to spawn a inventory like this: http://prntscr.com/1j926t codes for the inventory: Cbow: 9185 chaps : 2497 dds: 1215 overload: 15332 super restores: 3024 ava: 20068 spec restore: 15300 death runes: 560 blood runes: 565 water runes: 555 wild pies: 7208
I want the gear like this: http://prntscr.com/1j92k5 Codes for gear: guthis mitre (hat): 10454 Guthix legs: 10466 Ghostly robe top: 6107 Saradomin cape: 2412 Ancient staff: 4675 Book: 3842 Gloves: 7459 Boots: 3105 Amulet: 6585 bolts: 9244
The 2nd commands i want is called ::hybrid. I want it to spawn a hybrid inventory like this: http://prntscr.com/1j944p Codes for inventory: whip: 21375 dragon defender: 20072 amulet: 6585 boots: 11732 karils body: 4736 dragon dagger: 5698 fighter torso: 10551 veracs skirt: 4759 super restore: 3024 overload: 15332 death runes: 560 blood runes: 565 water runes: 555 wild pies: 7208
And a gear setup like this: http://prntscr.com/1j94tm Codes for gear: helmet: 10828 cape: 2412 Staff: 15486 gloves: 7462 boots 6920 ring: 6737 book: 6889 robe top: 4712 robe legs: 4714 amulet: 18335
Thanks guys. Just post below in a code. Thanks!

item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“br0nz3 pk3r, post:7, topic:527155”]Im sorry man, thanks for your help… Also, is there a way it puts it in your equipped slot automaticly and spawns an inventory with the same command?[/quote]Yes. It’s the same code except you add in the part where it sets player equipment.

Read full topic

item.title: [718 Matrix] Help please with 2 commands!
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“br0nz3 pk3r, post:3, topic:527155”]Maybe because i don’t know how? i didn’t ask for some smart comment because Its not even my server, and the owner wont do it unless i code the thing. And i cant code.[/quote]It wasn’t a smart comment. Haven’t you stopped and thought if the owner of the server you play on can’t program anything himself or is too lazy to do it, that the server probably won’t be very successful.

I decided I would cater to your needs, here is your code. I expect you to actually attempt to do something yourself next time or at least search for common problems via Google.

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("Command name here")) { player.getIvnentory().addItem(ITEMID, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(ITEMID, 1); return true; }

[quote=“br0nz3 pk3r, post:5, topic:527155”]Can you not read ? its my friends server and he wont do it unless i get the codes cuz hes to “busy”…[/quote]Being an arrogant prick on the thread that you’re asking for help on isn’t a smart idea. Next time you won’t meet as nice of a guy as me and won’t be helped. Also, I think ‘lazy’ or ‘incompetent’ should be used instead of ‘busy’.

Read full topic

item.title: [718 Matrix] Help please with 2 commands!
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

We are not spoon feeding you. How about you look where commands are handled, and find a command that gives you an item. After that, modify it to give you the items you want, change the name, and there you go.
